name: S1: Ep 10/11 "Swap Meet" & "Weasel Love" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions
tags: Saved By The Bell: The New Class

questions.text: Ep 10: What event was happening at the school in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Swap meet.

	Mr. Belding had what he called the hottest items, his dead pet goldfish had been mounted on plaques. They were called Flipper and Jaws. Almost all of the other students were selling various things that had belonged to their parents.

questions.text: Ep 10: How much did Scott need to raise for concert tickets?
questions.explanation:
$200.

	Tickets were sold out for the Janet Jackson concert. Scalpers wanted $100 each for tickets. Scott promised to get tickets for himself and Rachel.

questions.text: Ep 10: What did Weasel get that was worth a large chunk of money?
questions.explanation:
A comic book.

	He got issue #59 of "Defender Dog" that had a misprint in it. Weasel had to call Honolulu Harry's to find out how much it was worth. Turned out to be worth $600. Tommy D sold it for $9 while Scott and Weasel were finding out the value.

questions.text: Ep 10: Who was a big fan of Defender Dog?
questions.explanation:
Crunch.

	Crunch said that issue #59 was the missing piece in his collection. He had been a fan since he was a young child. "When he got off the papers, I got off the Pampers" Crunch told Scott and Weasel.

Weasel.

	Scott and Weasel tricked Crunch into getting his comic protected. Weasel dressed up as Harry at the comic shop and tricked Crunch into trading his comic for a handful of others.

questions.text: Ep 11: What was the name of the girl with a crush on Weasel?
questions.explanation:
Natalie.

	She was one of the "nerds" in the school. It was the first episode she had popped up in during the series. She was a new student who had been a computer pen pal of Weasel's before moving to the area.

questions.text: Ep 11: What group was trying to raise money in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Orchestra.

	They were raising money for a new piano. The national group was considering Bayside to play in New York. They were raising money for the piano by selling tickets to a dance.

questions.text: Ep 11: Which celebrity did Weasel describe himself to look like?
questions.explanation:
Tom Cruise.

	He told Natalie in an email that he was a "curly-haired" Tom Cruise. She said he looked just like that when they met. He was actually a very diminutive, "weak" schoolboy who looked nothing like Tom Cruise.

Weasel.

	Technically both Natalie and Weasel got makeovers, but she wasn't an option in the quiz. After her makeover, Weasel felt like she was too cool and good looking for him. So the gang gave him a makeover and helped him with his confidence. He then changed his name to "The Fox" briefly.

questions.text: Ep 11: Screech (from the original series) made a cameo appearance in the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	While he became a regular character in future seasons, he didn't appear in season one at all. Other than Mr. Belding, no characters from the original series were in this episode.
